text: Splix is available for macOS, Windows and Linux. Download the desktop application at [splix.org/#/download](https://splix.org/#/download). Extract the archive and move the files to your desired location. Open the executable/app, and agree to any prompts.
After starting the app, you will see the Splix main-screen, which is shown above. Get familiar with the user-interface, and proceed to the next step.
Add Splix executable to your path. This step is not necessary, but is recommended if you want to use latest features which are not available in the user-interface.
This is an example command for macOS, and it will add Splix to your path, if your shell is [zsh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z_shell). Now you should have access to Splix from the terminal.
